name: polygon-management-app
description: Fullstack polygon management application with Node.js and React

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/dist frontend/node_modules node_modules
